author: Austen Goslin
title: Steam sets new records amid worldwide lockdown
description: As most of the world undergoes social distancing in order to help stop the spread of the novel coronavirus, it seems that more people are playing games as Steam sets a new record for its high number of players ever
content: With COVID-19 continuing to spread around the world, many countries and cities have encouraged everyone who can to practice social distancing. This means no large gatherings, no going out to eat, and a whole lot more staying inside. As one of the worlds forem… [+2050 chars]
